resources.string: A span of suspension cables of Anzac Bridge compare nicely with the mast ropes of the old sailing ship.
A bee is depicted on a vibrant yellow flower, showcasing the intricate details of the insect and its role as a pollinator.

A Quebec City mosque on Jan. 29 was attacked and 6 are dead with eight others wounded. 6 flowers - one for each victim of this terrible act. The image features a vibrant group of flowers, showcasing various types such as asters. These include alpine aster and New England aster among others. The colors prominently display shades of purple, highlighting their petals and natural beauty in an outdoor setting.
